column5: hey evryone,ive been fishin for muskie for over a year now and was just wondering if anyone has ever tried muskie fishing on rice lake? ive caught some on jigheads and and cranks while fsing for walleye but dontknow ifit is worth tryin for muskie.  any help?  thanks
A couple friends have been going up there for years staying at musky bay camp they have been doing well on my baits with the double 8's being the best size fishing docks and weed beds all casting.

I've had 4 musky's break me off in the past 3 weekends while walleye fishing on Rice. Lost all 4 buckatils too! lol I'd say... grab a wire leader, a few large bucktails, find a weedline and get to RIPPIN'!
Think you just answered your own question. Imagine what might happen if you actually targeted them?
I've got a buddy who's already landed 5 as of last weekend. They are there, I'm not sure about how big they are but there is numbers.
